author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cambridge Chocolate Technologies Q1 Net Loss Widens To 2.5 Mln Zlotys
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - CAMBRIDGE CHOCOLATE TECHNOLOGIES SA :
* SAID ON FRIDAY THAT ITS Q1 NET LOSS WAS 2.5 MILLION ZLOTYS VERSUS LOSS OF 1.0 MILLION ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
* Q1 REVENUE WAS 0.4 MILLION ZLOTYS VERSUS 2.5 MILLION ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
